(leave only one on its own line)** /kind bug **Description** The host HostNetwork field is always true even when the pod uses a private netns. This caused https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/14015 because the regression test was checking this field. **Steps to reproduce the issue:** 1. `podman pod create --name t --share net --network private` 2. `podman pod inspect t --format {{.InfraConfig.HostNetwork}}` **Describe the results you received:** `true` **Describe the results you expected:** `false` **Output of `podman version`:** latest main
